snippet: Sylvia Nasar, a journalism professor, claimed that Columbia’s journalism school had mishandled funds generated by an endowment from the Knight Foundation.
abstract: New York State appeals court dismisses lawsuit by Sylvia Nasar, professor at Columbia University Graduate School of Journalism, who had accused school of mishandling $4.5 million in funds generated by endowment from Knight Foundation.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Nasar, a journalism professor, claimed that Columbia’s journalism school had mishandled funds generated by an endowment from the Knight Foundation.

headline.main: Appeals Court Throws Out Suit by Columbia Professor
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Throws Out Suit by Columbia Professor

keywords.value: Knight, John S and James L, Foundation
keywords.name: organizations
